params.1086: Fishing spot indicators - Mouse over tooltip
params.1088: fishing spot indicators,small fishing net,big fishing net,drift net,fishing rod,fly fishing rod,oily fishing rod,barbarian rod,harpoon,lobster pot,cormorants glove,karambwan vessel
params.1096: When enabled, hovering over a fishing spot indicator will show all the fish the spot has to offer.
params.1116: You can only change this setting if fishing spot indicators are enabled.
